rows.label: qst700204_msg0001
rows.name:
Ta-dah! Please to introduce Sample A
and Sample B!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0002
rows.name:
Now will have littlepon to sample hats.
Would like to ask friends to choose and
see if hit with customers!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0003
rows.name: Wait...you want us to choose?

rows.label: qst700204_msg0004
rows.name:
Are you sure about that? None of us
are exactly skilled in commerce...

rows.label: qst700204_msg0005
rows.name: Pssht, it fine!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0006
rows.name:
Friends were ones who helped out
in first place.

rows.label: qst700204_msg0007
rows.name:
It only natural that you be ones to
decide final sales product!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0008
rows.name: Well, if you put it that way...

rows.label: qst700204_msg0009
rows.name: OK! We'd be happy to oblige!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0010
rows.name:
Then first, we start off with cute style
knit hat!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0011
rows.name: What you think? Does it suit?

rows.label: qst700204_msg0012
rows.name: Next comes casual cap!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0013
rows.name:
Yes, is also brimming with style!
Surely big hit with Nopon!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0014
rows.name: Well then, friends...

rows.label: qst700204_msg0015
rows.name: Is now up to you to make final decision!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0401
rows.name: Which hat should be the final product?

rows.label: qst700204_msg0402
rows.name: The knit hat

rows.label: qst700204_msg0403
rows.name: The casual cap

rows.label: qst700204_msg0101
rows.name:
Is excellent choice! Then new product
will be knit hat!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0201
rows.name:
Is excellent choice! Then new product
will be casual cap!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0301
rows.name:
Dekudeku will take stroll around town
now wearing hat, get opinion on street!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0302
rows.name:
Obibi should get to work making much
hats as possible to be ready for selling!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0303
rows.name:
Meh-meh-meh?! Popularity is through
roof!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0304
rows.name:
Nopon almost climbing over each other
to get to new product! Obibi never seen
such sight!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0305
rows.name:
Is sure to make huge profit from sales
now!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0306
rows.name:
So many thanks to friends...
Have not enough thanks to give!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0307
rows.name: Eh, it was no big deal.

rows.label: qst700204_msg0308
rows.name:
Voltis Trade Guild are a force to
be reckoned with if a kid his age
is keeping businesses afloat!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0309
rows.name: Hah, you seen nothing yet, friends!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0310
rows.name:
Dekudeku not just keep business
afloat. Me intend to turn it into hottest
store in Iira!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0311
rows.name:
Looking forward to it! You two just
make sure you get on with each other,
OK?

rows.label: qst700204_msg0312
rows.name:
Oh, is no problem there. Just as long
as Obibi puts on some clothes first!

rows.label: qst700204_msg0313
rows.name: Oh please, put sock in it...

rows.label: qst700204_msg0314
rows.name: Right, then...

rows.label: qst700204_msg0315
rows.name:
Obibi's business is alive and kicking.
I can't see any reason to be hanging
around any longer.

rows.label: qst700204_msg0316
rows.name: Agreed.

rows.label: qst700204_msg0317
rows.name: Lead the way, my good sir.

rows.label: qst700204_msg0318
rows.name:
But now is not shop in need of
rescue... Is Obibi self!
